code: import React,{useState}from'react';import{ChartBarIcon,FolderIcon}from'@heroicons/react/24/outline';import RASPOverview from'../../components/RASP/RASPOverview';import RASPProjects from'../../components/RASP/RASPProjects';import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";const RASP=()=>{const[activeTab,setActiveTab]=useState('overview');const tabs=[{id:'overview',label:'Overview',icon:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(ChartBarIcon,{className:"w-4 h-4"})},{id:'projects',label:'Projects',icon:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(FolderIcon,{className:"w-4 h-4"})}];return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"space-y-6",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"flex items-center justify-between",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h1",{className:"text-2xl font-bold text-gray-900",children:"Runtime Application Self-Protection (RASP)"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("p",{className:"text-gray-600",children:"Projects and overview for runtime application protection"})]})}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"border-b border-gray-200",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("nav",{className:"-mb-px flex space-x-8",children:tabs.map(tab=>/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("button",{onClick:()=>setActiveTab(tab.id),className:"flex items-center py-2 px-1 border-b-2 font-medium text-sm ".concat(activeTab===tab.id?'border-blue-500 text-blue-600':'border-transparent text-gray-500 hover:text-gray-700 hover:border-gray-300'),children:[tab.icon,/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("span",{className:"ml-2",children:tab.label})]},tab.id))})}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"mt-6",children:[activeTab==='overview'&&/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(RASPOverview,{}),activeTab==='projects'&&/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(RASPProjects,{})]})]});};export default RASP;
